Others: Brayan Bello threw eight shutout innings and Tyler O'Neill cranked a two-run homer as the Boston Red Sox blanked the Toronto Blue Jays 3-0.
Bowden Francis has been one of the best pitchers in baseball this month.
Francis is coming off a near-no-hitter last Saturday against the Los Angeles Angels.
The Red Sox start struggling righty Kutter Crawford, who has a 7.30 ERA in five starts in August.
